001.comments: VISA 360 001 will be delivered with some online and some in-person components at the UBC Vancouver campus (adhering to physical distancing and health requirements).
001.building: Ponderosa Commons East - Audain Art Centre/Spruce

01W.comments: VISA 360 01W is a waitlist for VISA 360 001. Students will be moved periodically from the waitlist into the class, based on date of registration, and notified via email.

description: Investigation of contemporary practices in sculpture and the use of scale. Emphasis on public sculpture.
